name: Have Fun! Dont DIE!
description:
Life Party Survival Simulator! Party Hard - Go Down a Legend!

But remember Kids "Drugs are Bad, M'Kay!"

The Object of the Game it to help our young lad Jay have as much "FUN" as possible at his own house party/rave whilst his parents are away, but make sure you don't get carried away and OD on all the fun at hand!

Team:
